projects.title: Red Baron
projects.description:
Simple top-down shoot'em up video game made with Godot engine.

Have basic features such as:

  • Collisions
  • Animations
  • Sound effects
  • Different enemies
  • Basic UI
  • Score and Highscore system
  • Component-based entities

projects.title: Top-down action game
projects.description:
Simple top-down video game made with Godot engine.

Have basic features such as:

  • 8-directional movement
  • Animations
  • Sound effects
  • Enemy states: idle, wandering, chase and attacking.
  • Basic health UI
  • Player-Camera follow
  • Basic visual effects

projects.title: 2D Bike racing
projects.description:
Short demo of "Bike run" showcasing some basic concepts applied such as:

  • Random box (obstacle) spawning
  • Free player (bike) movement
  • Score (Not rendered on screen)
  • Game over

Made with python and pygame.

projects.title: Intro to shading
projects.description:
Small and short introduction to shaders using gdshader format.

Topics mentioned:

  • Vertex
  • Fragment
  • Uniform
  • UV
